title: MMR Vaccine Doesn't Increase Autism Spectrum Disorder Risk : AJN The American Journal of Nursing
author: Rosenberg; Karen
description: According to this study: Receipt of the measles-mumps-rubella vaccine does not increase the risk of autism spectrum disorders, even in high-risk children.
